resources.string: When %s is attached, changes the behaviour of the smartphone shutter button to: turn the fan on/off. Note that the shutter button's previously assigned function is disabled when this setting is turned on.
When you connect a headset to Xperia Stream's headset connection terminal, it will be recognised as USB Audio on the smartphone.
When you output video via the Xperia Stream's HDMI port, it will be recognised as Displayport output on the smartphone.

The LED lights up or flashes different colours to indicate the status. Green light: the fan is spinning correctly Red flashing: the fan was stopped or ceased to function Orange light: connection to a power adapter was detected
Use of a headset is recommended when inputting audio while %s is connected, in order to maximise mic quality.
